sample.title: Caesar Analysis using character frequencies
sample.summary: Cryptanalysis of the Caesar cipher using character frequencies
sample.description: This sample performs a statistical analysis attack on the Caesar cipher. The character frequencies are analyzed and -- based on the result -- the substitution done by the Caesar cipher is reverted.
sample.keywords: Caesar, Julius, Substitution, monoalphabetic, frequencies, Attack, Analysis
sample.title: Caesar Analyse mittels Buchstabenhäufigkeiten
sample.description: Diese Vorlage führt einen statistischen Angriff auf die Caesar-Chiffre durch. Zunächst werden die Buchstabenhäufigkeiten analysiert um dann, auf Grundlage des Ergebnisses der Analyse, die Substitution der Caesar-Chiffre umzukehren.

replacement.value: \fs18{\fs21\b Caesar \emdash statistical analysis}\line This sample performs a statistical analysis attack on the Caesar cipher. The character frequencies are analyzed and \emdash based on the result \emdash the substitution done by the Caesar cipher is reverted.\line\line {\fs20\ul\b How it works}\line The encrypted text is forwarded to the FrequencyTest component. This component generates a bar chart of the character frequencies of the encrypted text and sends it to the CaesarAnalysisHelper component. This component performs the cryptanalysis of a Caesar cipher using the frequency of 1-grams in the encrypted text. The calculated shift key is finally given to a Caesar component to decrypt the encrypted text. The key can also seen in the TextOutput "Key".\line The components would be able not only to handle 1-grams (unigrams), but also n-grams (bigrams, trigrams, ...).
